SELECT TESTER_MODEL, VERSION, WHY, SUBSTR(CREATE_DATE,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(CREATE_DATE,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(CREATE_DATE,7,2)||' '||SUBSTR(CREATE_DATE,9,2)||':'||SUBSTR(CREATE_DATE,11,2)||':'||SUBSTR(CREATE_DATE,13,2) AS CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER FROM LC_VERSION_REGISTER
1 = 1
AND CREATE_DATE >= #{createDateStart}
AND CREATE_DATE <= #{createDateEnd}
AND TESTER_MODEL LIKE '%'|| #{testerModel} || '%'
AND VERSION LIKE '%'|| #{version} || '%'
AND WHY LIKE '%'|| #{why} || '%'
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
